title: Who composed the Dark Star Thresh login theme?

embed.description: Uploaded by League of Legends on 2016-06-02.

replies.body:
Hey there!

I did! Thanks for listening ;-)

Ed the Conqueror
I hear you do most themes out of the Log In screens nowadays :P

> [{quoted}](name=Makuta Teridax,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3osYFynf,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2016-06-03T11:49:52.651+0000)
>
> I hear you do most themes out of the Log In screens nowadays :P

Naaaaaah we all pitch in :P

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3osYFynf,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2016-06-03T16:06:59.835+0000)
>
> Naaaaaah we all pitch in :P

What software do you us to put motion into your art?

> [{quoted}](name=KingCamel69,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3osYFynf,comment-id=0001000200000000,timestamp=2016-06-03T18:34:26.311+0000)
>
> What software do you us to put motion into your art?

What do you mean by motion?

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3osYFynf,comment-id=00010002000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-03T18:36:34.394+0000)
>
> What do you mean by motion?

threshs movement in thee loginn theme.
I dealt it! It was me! {{champion:29}}

ED, who would I contact if I wanted to use this song and other LOL logins in a film I am making? Long story short, we are going to be showing it at a make-a-wish fundraiser. I just need pointed in the right direction. Thanks! Love your work!

It's beautiful *.*

Another masterpiece by Ed, I can see why he is referred to as the _"Conqueror"_.

The first time I saw the skin, for some reason I immidietly though of [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4FEfRgMHg44) song.
It's pretty cool with the visuals.
